blog.description: American who loves the UK. Doctor Who. David Tennant. Catherine Tate. Sherlock. Benedict Cumberbatch. Fan Fiction. Plus some other fandoms sprinkled throughout. :) I'm a geeky, nerdy, woman, and proud of it. :)

tags: for the sake of fanfic can I get an answer?
or do I have to make one up?
title: Cale’s Real First Name?
body: Okay - to anyone out there who has the Blu-Ray/DVD of Bad Samaritan - do you catch Cale’s real first name? I know the last name is Valkenberg, it’s said several times by the FBI, but I don’t believe we catch his first name, do we? I’ve watched it 1.5 times now and am too busy to watch again right now. :)

reblog.comment: Okay - to anyone out there who has the Blu-Ray/DVD of Bad Samaritan - do you catch Cale’s real first name? blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions

tags: sorry about the quality....couldn't decide if i should go with my phone or camera...
because of my awkwardness the phone won out
though it was clearly the worse choice 😂
i know videos have already been up for ages
so this is just in case anybody would like to see it from a different perspective 🤷‍♀️
also....so sorry about my stupid laugh 😳

Sorry about the crashing picture...

tags: i'll probably learn someday! should have used a higher video quality 🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️
looking at the video i actually interacted with him for nearly half a minute
which is quite long for a situation like this 😲
imagine all the great reaction photos if i had managed to keep the camera on his face throughout
guess that's what i get for being so short
it' just natural to hold a phone in such an upward position wheb talking 😂
also i only used fhd quality because it said the video stabiliserer wouldn't work in higher quality
but seems that was a mistake 🤷‍♀️
it was the first time i used my phone for something like this
also....yes he is laughing at me 😂😂😂

summary: The Blu-ray range, Doctor Who: The Collection continues in November with Season 19, the first full run of episodes starring...
body:
The Blu-ray range, Doctor Who: The Collection continues in November with Season 19, the first full run of episodes starring Peter Davison as the Fifth Doctor!

This follows last month’s release of Doctor Who: The Collection – Season 12, Tom Baker’s debut season as the Fourth Doctor; with Limited Edition packaging, at least in the UK, that first set is currently sold out from Amazon while third-party sellers are, at the time of writing, flogging copies for £150. Suffice to say, these sets are already proving popular.

Doctor Who: The Collection – Season 19 collects together Castrovalva (Four episodes); Four To Doomsday (Four Episodes); Kinda (Four Episodes); The Visitation (Four Episodes); Black Orchid (Two Episodes); Earthshock (Four Episodes); and Time-Flight (Four episodes). All 26 episodes are being remastered from scratch by Peter Crocker and Mark Ayres. With this season’s original 16mm film elements still in existence, the location material can be presented in true HD, with studio material upscaled, making this the ideal choice for the Blu-ray treatment!

The eight-disc Limited Edition includes brand new Special Features exclusive to this set like:

  • Five new ‘Making-Of’ documentaries for Castrovalva, Four To Doomsday, Black Orchid, Earthshock, and Time-Flight;
  • Surround sound mixes for Kinda and Earthshock;
  • An Extended Version of Black Orchid: Part One;
  • Rare studio footage from Castrovalva, Four To Doomsday, Earthshock, and Time-Flight;
  • Updated special effects for Castrovalva;
  • Seven more editions of Behind The Sofa;
  • A newly-shot one-hour interview, Peter Davison In Conversation with Matthew Sweet;
  • The Peter Davison/David Tennant Childen in Need special, Time Crash.

All this, plus hours of extensive special features previously released on DVD, and more exclusive content.

Lee Binding is again providing stunning packaging design and Pete McTighe has written extensive booklet notes and is the content consultant for the title. Doctor Who: The Collection is executively produced for BBC Studios by Russell Minton.

Doctor Who: The Collection – Season 19 will be available to pre-order from HMV and Amazon from tomorrow (22nd August 2018).

Doctor Who: The Collection Continues with Season 19 in November The Blu-ray range, Doctor Who: The Collection continues in November with Season 19, the first full run of episodes starring Peter Davison as the Fifth Doctor!

summary: Jennifer Garner and David Tennant Set to Star in Upcoming HBO Comedy 'Camping'
title: Jennifer Garner and David Tennant Set to Star in Upcoming HBO Comedy 'Camping'
body:
Jennifer Garner and David Tennant Set to Star in Upcoming HBO Comedy ‘Camping’

Jennifer Garner and David Tennant are set to star in the upcoming HBO comedy “Camping,” —  based on the British series of the same name created by Julia Davis.

Written and executive produced by Lena Dunham and Jenni Konner, the series follows Walt (Tennant), whose 45th birthday was supposed to be a delightful weekend back to nature, but becomes a weekend of tested marriages and woman on woman…

View On WordPress
